mathematica: nmax = 12; coes = CoefficientList[ Series[ Sin[x^2]/2, {x, 0, 4*nmax + 2}], x]; a[n_] := coes[[4*n + 3]]*(4*n + 2)!; Table[a[n], {n, 0, nmax}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 14 2012 *)Table[(-1)^n (2 + 4 n)!/(2 (1 + 2 n)!), {n, 0, 25}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 22 2015 *)
prog: (Sage)def A009564(n):    return falling_factorial(4*n+2,2*n+1)/(2*(-1)^n)[A009564(n) for n in (0..12)]  # _Peter Luschny_, Dec 14 2012(MAGMA) [(-1)^n*Factorial(2+4*n)/(2*Factorial(1+2*n)): n in [0..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 22 2015(PARI) a(n) = (-1)^n*(2+4*n)!/(2*(1+2*n)!); \\ _Altug Alkan_, Dec 22 2015
author: _R. H. Hardin_
extensions: Definition corrected and terms a(10)-a(12) from _Peter Luschny_, Dec 14 2012
